title: I dont have another email but made a smurf, can i have trist/garen/alistar please + skins?
body: Is this still a thing you guys do via submitting a ticket or ?

replies.body: If you've already redeemed those codes through those venues, we might still be able to help.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can work something out.  We'll reply back asap!
